title: English Assignment
description: English is a Germanic language that evolved from the early medieval dialects spoken by the Anglo-Saxons who settled in England. Over the centuries, it has been heavily influenced by Latin, French, and other languages due to historical events like the Norman Conquest in 1066.

title: Bangla Assignment
description: Bangla is a Germanic language that evolved from the early medieval dialects spoken by the Anglo-Saxons who settled in England. Over the centuries, it has been heavily influenced by Latin, French, and other languages due to historical events like the Norman Conquest in 1066.
